content.body:
This article explains how to verify the email address associated with your Yext account. This is required in order to log in to certain Yext\-owned websites (e.g., to log into help.yext.com).





To verify your email address:





1. Click on the Account Details icon in the navigation bar and click **Account Settings**.
2. Click **Personal Details**.
3. Click on the **Send Verification Email** link next to your email address.



   * This will send an email address to the email address listed.




4. Once you receive the email, click **CONFIRM MY EMAIL** in the email to complete the verification process.

helpstarter_helpArticleBodyMarkdown.markdown:
This article explains how to verify the email address associated with your Yext account. This is required in order to log in to certain Yext-owned websites (e.g., to log into help.yext.com).

To verify your email address:

  1. Click on the Account Details icon in the navigation bar and click Account Settings.
  2. Click Personal Details.
  3. Click on the Send Verification Email link next to your email address.
    • This will send an email address to the email address listed.
  4. Once you receive the email, click CONFIRM MY EMAIL in the email to complete the verification process.

content.name: Verify Your Email Address
